text: Elio Pietrini (2 January 1939 – 18 January 2022) was an Argentine-born Venezuelan actor. He appeared in many telenovelas. Pietrini was born in Buenos Aires, Argentina. He was known for his role as Rubén in Abigail. He also appeared in Amores de fin de siglo and Destino de Mujer. Pietrini died on 18 January 2022 in Miami, Florida from COVID-19, aged 83. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Venezuelan actors Category:Actors from Buenos Aires Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Florida
title: Elio Pietrini
